title: The activities of the state described in the pa...

content.prompt: The activities of the state described in the passage are consistent with which of the following Song dynasty policies?

choices.label: Increasing state investment in economic development, such as improving the Grand Canal
State-sponsored maritime expeditions in the Indian Ocean, such as those led by Zheng He
Tribute exchanges with Central Asian peoples, such as the Mongols
Revival of traditional Chinese forms of learning, such as Neoconfucianism

topic.text: 1.1: Developments in East Asia from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
